PART I
Acts, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN
LAW JUSTICE AND IIUMAN RIGIITS DTVISION
Islamabad, the 26th February, 2015
No. F. 2(f [2,01]Pub.-The following Ordinance promulgated by the
President is hereby published for general information:-
OnotNeNce No. II or 2015
AN
ORDINANCE
to amend the Safeguord Meosures Ordinance, 2002
WHEREAs it is expedient further to amend the Safeguard Measures
Ordinance, 2002 (XXXI of2002), for the purposes hereinafter appearingl
(25)
Price: Rs. 2.00
[33 7(2015)Ex.Caz.]ANo wHenees the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session
and the President is satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary
to take immediate action;
26 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., FEB.26, 2015 [Panr I
Now, tHsnerone, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (l) of
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islilmic Republic of Pakistan, the President
is pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:-
l. Short title and commencement.{l) This Ordinance may be
called the Safeguard Measures (Amendment) Ordinance, 2015.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Omission of sections 39, 40,41 and 44, Ordinance XXXI of
2fi)2.-In the Safeguard Measures Ordinance, 2OOZ (XXXI of 2002), hereinafter
referred to as the said Ordinance, sections 39,40,41 and 44 shall be omitted.
3. Substitution of section 46, Ordinance XXXI of 2002.-In the
said Ordinance, for section 46, the following shallbe substituted, namely:-:-
"46. Ordinance to override other laws.-The provisions of this
Ordinance shall have effect notwithstanding anything inconsistent
therewith contained in any other law for the time being in force:
Provided that this provision shall not apply to the National Tariff
Commission Act, 1990 (VI of 1990).".
MAMNOON HUSSAIN,
President.
Jusnce (R)
MUHAMMAD RAZA KHAN,
Secretary.
